column4: what kind of window manager should I install if I want to run an asterix or apache server on a laptop?
.. any wm you want, shouldn't matter
fluxbox is a personal favorite. it's an extension of blackbox with a lot of extensions, but without eating much resources. it's things you'd expect.. like the ability to alt-tab.
yes, you're running ubuntu. everything works. as opposed to other distros.
